Split.display_help: When the Large Tentacles are defeated, they split into two smaller tentacles.

Resistance.display_help: Hydra Head cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage. The Hydra Head can only be defeated with the Rikti Beam cannon.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam
Resistance.display_target_help: Hydra Head cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage. The Hydra Head can only be defeated with the Rikti Beam cannon.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam

Force_Field.display_help: The Rikti Pods generate a Force Field that protects the Hydra Head from the Rikti Particle Beam.
Force_Field.display_target_help: The Rikti Pods generate a Force Field that protects the Hydra Head from the Rikti Particle Beam.

Reinforcements.display_help: When the Hydra Head is at half life, Rikti will teleport in to protect it.
Reinforcements.display_target_help: When the Hydra Head is at half life, Rikti will teleport in to protect it.

Reinforcements_2.display_help: When the Hydra Head is at nearly defeated, Rikti will teleport in to protect it.
Reinforcements_2.display_target_help: When the Hydra Head is at nearly defeated, Rikti will teleport in to protect it.

Tentacle_Death.display_help: When the Hydra Head dies, all Tentacles die with it.
Tentacle_Death.display_target_help: When the Hydra Head dies, all Tentacles die with it.
